author: edwingo
msg: Removed workaround for previous Beta3 code which is no longer needed and
causes additional bugs in combination w/ other apache properties.  Calling
setAttribute(name, value) w/ a value of null, causes name to be unset.

author: elena
msg: If an XML document did not have any internal DTD subset we were ignoring settings

author: neilg
msg: committing some (slightly modified to take care of regressions) massive XNI changes on behalf of Andy Clark.  These make use of XMLResourceIdentifier in start.*Entity calls, and add Augmentations to various DTD Handler callbacks.  Things yet to do:
1.  Make Augmentation callbacks consistent.  They are null sometimes, not others; need to make them null by default.
2.  Propagate XMLResourceIdentifier to remaining methods it could and is not being used in.

author: neeraj
msg: fix for bug id 5927. Thanks to 'Taki' for the solution.
